00001 !==============================================================================!
00002 ! MODULE: tally 
00003 !
00008 
00009 module tally
00010 
00011   implicit none
00012   private
00013   public :: set_spectrum_tally,add_to_tally,bank_tally,deallocate_tally,       &
00014  &          set_user_tally,calculate_statistics
00015 
00016   type, public :: tally_type
00017 
00018     real(8), allocatable :: E(:)      ! user defined energy structure
00019     real(8), allocatable :: val(:)    ! the temporary value
00020     real(8), allocatable :: sum(:)    ! the sum for the mean and var
00021     real(8), allocatable :: sum_sq(:) ! the sum for the variable
00022     real(8), allocatable :: mean(:)   ! mean of tallies
00023     real(8), allocatable :: std(:)    ! standard deviation of tallies
00024     logical :: flux_tally = .false.   ! is this the flux tally
00025     integer :: nbins                  ! number of tally regions
00026     real(8) :: width                  ! the uniform width
00027     real(8) :: emax                   ! max e
00028     real(8) :: emin                   ! min e
00029     integer :: react_type             ! reaction type id
00030     integer :: isotope                ! isotope number
00031 
00032   end type tally_type
00033 
00034 contains
00035 
00036 !===============================================================================
00037 ! SET_USER_TALLY
00040 
00041   subroutine set_user_tally(this,Ebins,n,react_type,isotope)
00042 
00043     ! formal variables
00044     type(tally_type) :: this        ! a tally
00045     integer          :: n           ! size of Ebins
00046     integer          :: react_type  ! reaction type
00047     integer          :: isotope     ! isotope for multiplier
00048     real(8)          :: Ebins(n)    ! vector of energy bins
00049     
00050     ! preallocate user-defined energy structure
00051     if (.not.allocated(this%E)) allocate(this%E(n))
00052 
00053     ! set energy structure
00054     this%E = Ebins
00055 
00056     ! set reaction type
00057     this%react_type = react_type
00058 
00059     ! set isotope
00060     this%isotope = isotope
00061 
00062     ! preallocate vectors
00063     if(.not.allocated(this%val)) allocate(this%val(n-1))
00064     if(.not.allocated(this%sum)) allocate(this%sum(n-1))
00065     if(.not.allocated(this%sum_sq)) allocate(this%sum_sq(n-1))
00066 
00067     ! zero out tallies
00068     this%val = 0.0_8
00069     this%sum = 0.0_8
00070     this%sum_sq = 0.0_8
00071 
00072   end subroutine set_user_tally
00073 
00074 !===============================================================================
00075 ! SET_SPECTRUM_TALLY
00078 
00079   subroutine set_spectrum_tally(this,emax,emin)
00080 
00081     ! formal variables
00082     type(tally_type) :: this    ! a tally
00083     real(8)          :: emax    ! max e
00084     real(8)          :: emin    ! min e
00085 
00086     ! set up automatic flux tally
00087     this%flux_tally = .true.
00088     this%nbins = 1000
00089     this%emax = emax
00090     this%emin = emin
00091     this%width = (log10(emax) - log10(emin))/dble(this%nbins)
00092 
00093     ! preallocate vectors
00094     if(.not.allocated(this%val)) allocate(this%val(1000)) 
00095     if(.not.allocated(this%sum)) allocate(this%sum(1000))
00096     if(.not.allocated(this%sum_sq)) allocate(this%sum_sq(1000)) 
00097 
00098     ! zero out tallies
00099     this%val = 0.0_8
00100     this%sum = 0.0_8
00101     this%sum_sq = 0.0_8
00102 
00103   end subroutine set_spectrum_tally
00104 
00105 !===============================================================================
00106 ! ADD_TO_TALLY
00109 
00110   subroutine add_to_tally(this,fact,totxs,E)
00111 
00112     ! formal variables
00113     type(tally_type) :: this     ! a tally 
00114     real(8)          :: fact     ! multiplier for tally
00115     real(8)          :: totxs    ! totalxs
00116     real(8)          :: E        ! neutron energy
00117 
00118     ! local variables
00119     integer :: i      ! iteration counter
00120     integer :: idx=0  ! index in tally grid
00121 
00122     ! use uniform grid sampling if flux tally
00123     if (this%flux_tally) then
00124 
00125       ! calculate index
00126       idx = ceiling((log10(E) - log10(this%emin))/this%width)
00127 
00128     else
00129 
00130       ! check for output bounds
00131       if (E < minval(this%E) .or. E > maxval(this%E)) return
00132 
00133       ! begin loop around energy vector to get index
00134       do i = 1,size(this%E)
00135         if (E < this%E(i)) then
00136           idx = i - 1
00137           exit
00138         end if
00139       end do
00140 
00141     end if
00142 
00143     ! add to tally
00144     if (idx /= 0) this%val(idx) = this%val(idx) + fact/totxs
00145 
00146   end subroutine add_to_tally
00147 
00148 !===============================================================================
00149 ! BANK_TALLY
00152 
00153   subroutine bank_tally(this)
00154 
00155     ! formal variables
00156     type(tally_type) :: this ! a tally
00157 
00158     ! record to sums
00159     this%sum    = this%sum    + this%val
00160     this%sum_sq = this%sum_sq + this%val**2
00161 
00162     ! zero out temp value
00163     this%val = 0.0_8
00164 
00165   end subroutine bank_tally
00166 
00167 !===============================================================================
00168 ! CALCULATE_STATISTICS
00171 
00172   subroutine calculate_statistics(this,n)
00173 
00174     ! formal variables
00175     type(tally_type) :: this ! a tally
00176     integer          :: n    ! number of histories run
00177 
00178     ! preallocate mean and stdev
00179     if (.not.allocated(this%mean)) allocate(this%mean(size(this%sum)))
00180     if (.not.allocated(this%std))  allocate(this%std(size(this%sum)))
00181 
00182     ! compute mean
00183     this%mean =  this%sum / dble(n)
00184 
00185     ! compute standard deviation
00186     this%std = sqrt((this%sum_sq/dble(n) - this%mean**2)/dble(n))
00187 
00188   end subroutine calculate_statistics
00189 
00190 !===============================================================================
00191 ! DEALLOCATE_TALLY
00194 
00195   subroutine deallocate_tally(this)
00196 
00197     ! formal variables
00198     type(tally_type) :: this ! a tally
00199 
00200     ! deallocate all
00201     if (allocated(this%E)) deallocate(this%E)
00202     if (allocated(this%val)) deallocate(this%val)
00203     if (allocated(this%sum)) deallocate(this%sum)
00204     if (allocated(this%sum_sq)) deallocate(this%sum_sq)
00205 
00206   end subroutine deallocate_tally
00207 
00208 end module tally
